snippet: They were nameless extras in Garry Winogrand's scenes from the 1960 Democratic National Convention. And now, thanks to all of the readers who responded to our plea, we think we know who they are.
abstract: They were nameless extras in Garry Winogrand's scenes from the 1960 Democratic National Convention. And now, thanks to all of the readers who responded to our plea, we think we know who they are.

byline.original: By SAMANTHA HENIG and STACEY BAKER

headline.main: Putting Names to Faces From the 1960 Democratic National Convention
